trans-unit.source: Represents a service contract that defines a set of operations that allows a client to update workflow service hosted with <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowUpdateableControlClient"></xref> class.
